pkgmetadata.longdescription: Spaghetti is an open-source Python library for the analysis of network-basedspatial data. Originating from the `network` module in `PySAL`_(Python Spatial Analysis Library), it is under active developmentfor the inclusion of newly proposed methods for buildinggraph-theoretic networks and the analysis of network events... _PySAL: http://pysal.org
